meanings.definition: The base of a pistil in a flower.
meanings.sent1: The stylopodium supports the pistil in the flower.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to damage the stylopodium when handling the flower.
meanings.sent3: The stylopodium decided to take a break from holding up the pistil.
meanings.sent4: The stylopodium stood strong like a pillar at the base of the flower.
meanings.sent5: The stylopodium, like a sturdy foundation, anchors the pistil in the flower.

meanings.definition: A structure at the base of a flower stalk.
meanings.sent1: The stylopodium provides support at the bottom of the flower stalk.
meanings.sent2: The gardener examined the stylopodium carefully before planting the flower.
meanings.sent3: The stylopodium threw a party for all the other flower structures.
meanings.sent4: The stylopodium, like a loyal friend, always stays at the base of the flower stalk.
meanings.sent5: The stylopodium, a sturdy base, ensures the flower stands tall and proud.

meanings.definition: A swelling at the base of a flower stalk.
meanings.sent1: The stylopodium bulged slightly at the bottom of the flower stalk.
meanings.sent2: The tiny insect crawled over the stylopodium on the flower stalk.
meanings.sent3: The stylopodium wore a tiny hat to cover its swelling at the base.
meanings.sent4: The stylopodium, like a gentle bump, marked the start of the flower stalk.
meanings.sent5: The stylopodium, a subtle enlargement, adds charm to the flower stalk.
